Resilient Systems REST API: FullOrgDTO

  3. FullOrgDTO

FullOrgDTO Data Type

Properties
name data type description
org_info JustOrgDTO General information about the organization.
us_enabled boolean Does the license enable US regulators?
canada_enabled boolean Does the license enable Canada regulators?
eu_enabled boolean Does the license enable EU regulators?
actions_framework_enabled boolean Indicates whether the org has enabled and is allowed to use the actions framework.
attachments_enabled boolean Can attachments be added to tasks and incidents for this org?
breach_enabled boolean Is the breach/privacy module enabled?
sir_enabled boolean Is the security module enabled?
threat_sources object A map of threat sources for this organization. All threat sources that Co3 supports are included in this list. The "enabled" property will be set to false if it is not enabled for this organization. See threatSourceDTO.

The key portion of the map contains the ID of the threat source. The value portion of the map contains the threatSourceDTO
phases object A map of all the possible incident phases. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the phase. The value portion contains the phaseDTO.
attachments_used_bytes number The number of bytes the organization is currently using for attachment storage. If this value is not requested, it will be returned as -1. To retrieve this value, see GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
users object Gets a user ID to userDTO map. This allows the caller to map the ID values returned by other APIs to user names.
unknown_users object
geos object A map of geo ID to orgGeoDTO. This identifies jurisdictions (geos) the company conducts business and/or has customer data.
groups object A map of group ID to groupDTO. This map contains all of the groups defined in the organization.
regs object A map of regulator ID to boolean values that indicates which regulators are enabled by default for the organization.
properties array of OrganizationPropertyDTO An array of organization properties. These are general purpose properties associated with the organization.
incident_types object A map of incident type ID incidentTypeDTO. This is the list of incident types defined for the organization.

See also incidentDTO (incident_type_ids property).
artifact_types object Relatability settings for incident artifact types.
The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the artifact type. The value portion contains the orgIncidentArtifactTypeDTO.
NOTE: This is deprecated in version 28. Please use incident_artifact_types instead.
incident_artifact_types object Incident artifact types for this organization. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the artifact type. The value portion contains the incidentArtifactTypeDTO.
id number The organization ID.
incident_severities object
task_categories object A map of all the possible task categories. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the category. The value portion contains the taskCategoryDTO.
inc_deletion_allowed boolean
automation_types object
field_value_modifications object

Example

{
  "org_info" : {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "addr" : "...",
    "addr2" : "...",
    "city" : "...",
    "state" : "...",
    "zip" : "..."
  },
  "us_enabled" : true,
  "canada_enabled" : true,
  "eu_enabled" : true,
  "actions_framework_enabled" : true,
  "attachments_enabled" : true,
  "breach_enabled" : true,
  "sir_enabled" : true,
  "threat_sources" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "phases" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "users" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "unknown_users" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "geos" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "groups" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "regs" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "properties" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "value" : "...",
    "client_property" : true
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "value" : "...",
    "client_property" : true
  } ],
  "incident_types" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "incident_artifact_types" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "id" : 12345,
  "incident_severities" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "task_categories" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "inc_deletion_allowed" : true,
  "automation_types" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "field_value_modifications" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  }
}
